text: aur jab moosa krodh aur dukh se bhara hua apanee qaum kee or lauta to usane kaha, "tum logon ne mere peechhe meree jagah bura kiya. kya tum apane rab ke hukm se pahale hee jaldee kar baithe?" phir usane takhtiyaan daal dee aur apane bhaee ka sir pakadakar use apanee or kheenchane laga. vah bola, "ai meree maan ke bete! logon ne mujhe kamazor samajh liya aur nikat tha ki mujhe maar daalate. atah shatruon ko mujhapar hulasane ka avasar na de aur atyaachaaree logon mein mujhe sammilit na kar.
